answers.answer: Its to test for gestational diabetes They give you a really sweet drink in either friut punch, orange, or lemon lime and make you wait an hour after you drink it then take some blood.
Definitely doesn't taste good. Its super sweet and you have to drink it very fast. I seriously almost threw up multiple times trying to choke it down My ob has grape orange and fruit punch
It's too test your blood sugar level. And it ***** you have to drink it within like 5-10 minuets then depending on if you are doing a one hour or a three hour test you wait then get blood drawn
